Atlanta.Georgia International Plaza: Georgia International Plaza is a 6-acre (24,000 m2) green space atop a 2,000-space parking garage in Downtown Atlanta, between the Georgia Dome on the west, the Georgia World Congress Center on the north, Philips Arena on the east and  In March 1994 the Georgia General Assembly approved $28 million to build the park. The public artwork "Flare across America" is located in the park.
